traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points. Only a Wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The naga makes three attacks, using Bite or Necrotic Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Ray
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +6, range 60 ft. Hit: 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At Will: Detect Magic, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Water Breathing
2/Day Each: Detect Thoughts, Dimension Door, Hold Person (level 3 version), Lightning Bolt (level 4 version)
